Command.Name: GetMySqlSechedulerInfo
Command.CommandText: select ID as Id, START_TIME as StartTime, END_TIME as EndTime, EXIT_CODE as ExitCode, PID as Pid, LOG as Log from scheduler_history LIMIT 1000

Command.Name: GetMySqlSechedulerInfoByPid
Command.CommandText: select ID as Id, START_TIME as StartTime, END_TIME as EndTime, EXIT_CODE as ExitCode, PID as Pid, LOG as Log from scheduler_history where Pid = @Pid
